function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Conflicts between human and wildlife dimensions in green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unestablished aspects in the relationship between mental health, wildlife, and green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conflicts related to the naturalness level of vegetation in green spaces","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate evidence on the effect of green space qualities on mental health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential human health risks, such as zoonotic and vector-borne diseases, associated with enhancing biodiversity in urban areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglected intangible benefits of wildlife to humans","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited investigation of the challenge of meeting human use and biodiversity conservation in a limited space","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for multiple dimensions under a socioecological-systems perspective","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic impacting people’s lives and businesses","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Threats to the validity of energy social science research","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Researchers from multiple institutions and countries collaborating on principles","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on social science research during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges to validity in research studies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited generalizability of findings in laboratory experiments","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Surrender of control and measurement in field studies","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 pandemic on research validity","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Movement restrictions leading to unemployment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented national debt from support packages","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term effects on mental health due to pandemic-related unemployment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic-induced changes in energy use impacting patterns of interaction with energy systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in disentangling the impacts of pandemic measures on energy use","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain implications for public commitment to low-carbon energy transitions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on context in energy social research","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of consistent response by social researchers in addressing contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in backgrounds and levels of experience among scholars using social research approaches in energy","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges to the validity of social science energy research presented by the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in prioritizing and justifying measures to account for potential pandemic-related influences","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Constraints such as research plans, budgets, timelines, and labor constraints affecting the ability to address validity challenges","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential exposure to sensitive data categories such as physical or mental health information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased burden on research participants due to additional data collection","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential emotional impact of collecting data on sensitive topics heightened by the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of reporting pandemic-related national and local policies during data collection","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to report significant changes in pandemic measures during data collection","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete representation of pandemic severity and its impacts","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diverse impact of pandemic response measures on individuals and households due to local and national policies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of existing social and economic inequalities due to the impacts of the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential effects of unexpected deprivation from work income on energy-related measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differentiated impacts on health, income, and employment situation across ethnicities, gender, and income groups","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in behavior and cognitive dimensions due to covid-19 response measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lingering psychological consequences of the covid-19 crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to accurately predict changes associated with energy-relevant outcomes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on research design, sample selection, and data collection due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic-induced spurious correlation in non-experimental research","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased salience and malleability of manipulated variables in experimental research","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"People required to stay at home leading to higher home energy usage","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous restrictions leading to varied study results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of longitudinal elements leading to unstable research findings","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased influence of distracting factors in online research due to pandemic-related restrictions, potentially impacting data validity","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift towards more online research due to persisting restrictions of in-person contact, potentially affecting the representativeness of the sample","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient consideration of data privacy and confidentiality in new data collection methods","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"}]}
